Package msnotepad.gui

Class GUIHandler

java.lang.Object
msnotepad.gui.GUIHandler
public class GUIHandler
extends java.lang.Object
GUIHandler class handle the main gui functioning of the MSNotepad, this is the point of distribution of work to other classes.

    initialiseMenuBar method is help to initialise and setup the menu bar of this app, and also initialize the menus and their item in the menu.

    initialiseScrollPane method is help to setup the text editor of the MSNotepad.

    loadFileToEditor method is help to load/reload the file, whose name is saved in InitialValues class.

    setRemainingMnemonicAndAccelerator method is help to set the MnemonicKeys and the Accelerator of the remaining items of the menus in the menu bar.

    setZoomValue method is help to set the zoom level of the editor textArea.
    static void updateFrameTitle()
    updateFrameTitle method is help to change the file name and unsaved mark of the opened file.
